name: Contemporary Country
description: Incorporates both heavily Pop-influenced styles, and the more pop-averse movement of Neo-Traditionalist Country.

children.name: Bro-Country
children.description: 21st century style with an often party-oriented sound and lyrical content, taking strong influence from Hard Rock, Hip Hop and Pop.

children.name: Bro-Country
children.description: 21st century style with an often party-oriented sound and lyrical content, taking strong influence from Hard Rock, Hip Hop and Pop.

children.name: Neo-Traditionalist Country
children.description: Emerged in the late 1980s as a reaction to the increased dominance of Country Pop, moving instead towards a Honky Tonk-rooted sound that centered the Singer-Songwriter.
